name: Introduction to Engineering
description: This course covers the fundamentals of engineering, including problem solving, design, and engineering principles.

name: Introduction to Architectural Engineering
description: This course provides an introduction to architectural engineering, which covers the design, analysis, and construction of buildings and other structures.

name: Structural Design
description: This course covers the design of structural components for buildings and other structures, including steel, concrete, masonry, and wood.

name: Architectural Building Systems
description: This course covers the design, selection, and operation of building systems, including heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC), plumbing, electrical, and security systems.

name: Construction Management
description: This course covers the management of construction projects, including cost estimating, scheduling, and project management.
